agenda.description: ** REVISION ** HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Appropriations TIME & DATE: 8:00 AM, Monday, May 6, 2019 PLACE: E1.030 CHAIR: Rep. John Zerwas The House Appropriations Committee will meet to consider the following bills: SB 68 Nelson | et al. Relating to strategic fiscal reviews of state agencies and programs. SB 69 Nelson Relating to the allocations of money for transfer to the state highway fund and the economic stabilization fund and the investment of money in the economic stabilization fund. SB 962 Nichols Relating to the determination of the sufficient balance of the economic stabilization fund for the purpose of allocating general revenue to that fund and the state highway fund. Bills added after last posting: SB 69 ** See Committee Coordinator for previous versions ** of the schedule, if applicable. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
